PropertyList:
altimeter.acAltimeterGlass
AltimeterGlass
noshadow AltimeterGlass
shader chrome Aircraft/Generic/Effects/glass_shader.png AltimeterGlass
altimeter Altimeter1000 Altimeter100 Altimeter AltimeterGlass
range altimeter 0 7
rotate Altimeter1000 instrumentation/altimeter/indicated-altitude-ft -0.0109
-6.057 -0.700 3.036
1 0 0
rotate Altimeter100 instrumentation/altimeter/indicated-altitude-ft -0.109
-6.057 -0.700 3.036
1 0 0
